mapper.insert:
insert into AUDITOR_OFFICIAL_TAX ( DOCUMENT_NO, DOCUMENT_CARRIER_IATA_NO, DOCUMENT_TYPE, ISSUE_DATE, TAX_CODE, TAX_ALREADY_PAID_FLAG, TAX_AMOUNT, TAX_CURRENCY, TAX_SEQ_NBR )
SELECT #{documentNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{documentCarrierIataNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} #{documentType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{issueDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{taxCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxAlreadyPaidFlag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxAmount, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{taxCurrency, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taxSeqNbr, jdbcType=DECIMAL} FROM DUAL
